title: ICE: "impossible range in AST" with a lone `...` (inclusive range syntax)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
#![feature(inclusive_range_syntax)]

fn main() {
    ...;
}
```
